pdfset:
<#if statements??><#list statements as statement>



  
        <#assign regInfo>?????</#assign>
        <#assign emailInfo>?????</#assign>
        <#assign telInfo>?????</#assign>
        <#assign vatInfo>?????</#assign>
        <#assign logoInfo>?????</#assign>
        <#assign logoChampion>?????</#assign>
        <#assign logoToggi>?????</#assign>
        
              <#assign regInfo>Company Registration No: 02545569. Registered Office: Laurel House, 146-148 Garnet Road, Leeds, LS11 5HP, United Kingdom.</#assign>
              <#assign emailInfo>info@finestbrands.co.uk</#assign>
              <#assign telInfo>0113 270 7007</#assign>
              <#assign vatInfo>GB 927 5446 012</#assign>
              <#assign logoInfo>https://system.eu1.netsuite.com/core/media/media.nl?id=11&c=5293281_SB1&h=fe2ea6b8bad94150217e</#assign>
              <#assign logoChampion>https://5293281-sb1.app.netsuite.com/core/media/media.nl?id=1308&c=5293281_SB1&h=e81a9c06d74f143fcbfa</#assign>
              <#assign logoToggi>https://5293281-sb1.app.netsuite.com/core/media/media.nl?id=1310&c=5293281_SB1&h=cd567fd4c49356911ee1</#assign>

  

    
       
          
          	

              
              ${companyInformation.companyName}
${companyInformation.addressText}
${telInfo}
VAT No. ${vatInfo}
               
              ${record@title}
            
          


	

	Statement To: ${customer.custentity_bbs_desl_account_number}
${statement.billaddress}
	Remit To: ${customer.custentity_bbs_desl_account_number}
${statement.billaddress}
	



  	

	Statement Date: ${statement.trandate}
	Statement Date: ${statement.trandate}
	



        
            
    			

      				
          			
                      
                        

                            ${statement.aging1@label}
                            ${statement.aging2@label}
                            ${statement.aging3@label}
                            ${statement.aging4@label}
                            ${statement.aging5@label}
                        
                        

                            ${statement.aging1}
                            ${statement.aging2}
                            ${statement.aging3}
                            ${statement.aging4}
                            ${statement.aging5}
                        
                    
                      
                    
                     	

                          
                          
                           
                           
                      	
                      	

                          	 
                          	 
                      	
                      	

                      		Amount Due
                        	${statement.amountDue}
                      	
                      	

                          	 
                          	 
                      	
						

                          	 
                          	 
                     	
                      	
                    
                      
                  	

          			
          			
                      <#assign done>N</#assign>
                          <#list statement.lines as line>
                              <#assign accno>${line.custbody_bbs_account_no}</#assign>
                              <#if accno?length gt 0 && done=="N" >
                                  
                                      
Bank Details for payments in ${statement.currency}:
                                      
${line.custbody_bbs_bank_account}
                                      
${line.custbody_bbs_bank_name}
                                      
Account Number: ${line.custbody_bbs_account_no}
                                      
Sort Code: ${line.custbody_bbs_sort_code}
                                      
IBAN: ${line.custbody_bbs_iban}
                                      
Swift Code: ${line.custbody_bbs_bic}
                                      
 

                                      <#assign done>Y</#assign>
                                  
                              </#if>
                          </#list>
                      
                      
                    	

                          	Amount Due
                        	${statement.amountDue}
                          	 
                      		 
                      	
                      
                      
                  	
          		
          	
          
 		


  

	Page  of 
	Page  of 
	



          
          
    


 
  
    

      
      
        
    		

      			All amounts shown in ${statement.currency}
    		
  		
  
	
		<#list statement.lines as line>
			<#if line_index==0>
				
					

						${line.datecol@label}
						${line.description@label}
						${line.charge@label}
						${line.payment@label}
						${line.balance@label}
					
				
			</#if>
			

				${line.datecol}
				${line.description}
				${line.charge}
				${line.payment}
				${line.balance}
			
		</#list>
	
      
      
      
      
        
    

      All amounts shown in ${statement.currency}
    
  
  
	
		<#list statement.lines as line>
			<#if line_index==0>
				
					

						${line.datecol@label}
						${line.description@label}
						${line.charge@label}
						${line.payment@label}
						${line.balance@label}
					
				
			</#if>
			

				${line.datecol}
				${line.description}
				${line.charge}
				${line.payment}
				${line.balance}
			
		</#list>
	
      
    
    
  
  
  



</#list>
<#else>

  

  
  
	
Please use Single Currency Advanced Printing Template
  

</#if>
